Text: hey can somebody explain why we only have season 8 ep an on wiki it says that season 9 is out right now im so lost???

Dude its because they separated season 1 into season 1 and 2 on Wikipedia.

Where as we have been using the order that combines these listings. Wikipedia used to use this same order and TV groups have been using it for as long as i can remember. No point changing the names of all those torrents and files just because the "official" order was changed.
